original_text: And brother will deliver brother over to death, and the father his child, and children will rise against parents and have them put to death.
korean_text: 형제가 형제를, 아버지가 자식을 죽는 데에 내주며 자식들이 부모를 대적하여 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And brother will deliver brother over to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 형제가 형제를 죽음에 넘길 것이요

sentences.original_text: and children will rise against parents
and have them put to death
